analysis.description:
Crowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/34/0x15bec22b1e00e9fa3997f61cbbe444aea8a35890.sol#130-145) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-testTokenA.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/34/0x15bec22b1e00e9fa3997f61cbbe444aea8a35890.sol#143-144)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/34/0x15bec22b1e00e9fa3997f61cbbe444aea8a35890.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.15 (/unique_chucks/34/0x15bec22b1e00e9fa3997f61cbbe444aea8a35890.sol#1): it allows old versions
